document_data.caption: A map showing Flint Street and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Flint Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Flint Street''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Flint Street was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. It ran north to south, branching from [[Ivory Street]] in the north and ending on the western half of [[Delzorin Street]] in the south. [[Pharra's Alley]] and the [[Street of Spells]] connected with Flint Street east side near its midpoint, while [[Tabra's Lane]] connected on its west side.
